product_name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY Appalachian Trail Guide: Maryland and Northern Virginia - 17th Edition - Guidebook and Maps
long_description: The updated edition of Appalachian Trail Guide: Maryland and Northern Virginia includes 3 water-resistant topo maps to help you plan a thru-hike of the Appalachian Trail.
short_description: The updated edition of Appalachian Trail Guide: Maryland and Northern Virginia includes 3 water-resistant topo maps to help you plan a thru-hike of the Appalachian Trail.
